Traits.Name: Receive Orders
Traits.Description: When this unit starts its turn in range of a command aura, it recharges all its abilities.

Interrupts.Name: Decoy
Interrupts.Description: When hit by an attack, turns that hit into a miss and teleports 3 spaces to an unoccupied space it can see, which is its ‘real’ location.

Actions.Name: Disguise
Actions.Description: A foe in range 5 must save. On a failed save, the Spy switches places with them, teleporting both characters.
